ARABIC: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ مَعْذِرَتُهُمْ وَلَهُمُ ٱللَّعْنَةُ وَلَهُمْ سُوٓءُ ٱلدَّارِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the Day when the excuses of the wrongdoers will not help them. The curse will be on them and they will have the most evil Home.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day upon which their excuses will not benefit the evil-doers, and the condemnation and evil abode will be theirs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: the Day when the excuses offered by the wrong-doers shall not avail them. They shall be victims of the curse and a woeful abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The excuses of the unjust will be of no benefit to them on that day. They will be condemned to live in a most terrible abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The day on which the unjust will not gain any benefit from their excuses, and for them is the curse, and for them is the wretched home.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The Day when their excuses will be of no profit to wrongdoers. Theirs will be the curse, and theirs will be the evil abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The day on which their excuse shall not benefit the unjust, and for them is curse and for them is the evil abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: upon the day when their excuses shall not profit the evildoers, and theirs shall be the curse, and theirs the evil abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The day when their excuse availeth not the evil-doers, and theirs is the curse, and theirs the ill abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The Day when their excuses will be of no avail to the wrongdoers, the curse shall be their lot and they will have the most evil abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: A Day whereon their excuse will not Profit the wrong- doers; and theirs Will be the curse and theirs the evil Abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: the day when the excuses of the wrongdoers will not benefit them, the curse will lie on them, and for them will be the ills of the [ultimate] abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Day when no profit will it be to Wrong-doers to present their excuses, but they will (only) have the Curse and the Home of Misery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The Day when their excuses will be of no profit to Zalimun (polytheists, wrong-doers and disbelievers in the Oneness of Allah). Theirs will be the curse, and theirs will be the evil abode (i.e. painful torment in Hell-fire).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day no excuse will benefit the harmdoers. Theirs shall be the curse, and an evil lodging.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Day when their excuses will not profit the wrongdoers, and the curse will be upon them, and they will have the Home of Misery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The Day their excuse will not benefit the wrongdoers, and they will have the curse, and they will have the worst home.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:52] the day when their excuses will not benefit (read lā yanfa‘u, or lā tanfa‘u) the evildoers, [even] if they were to offer them, and theirs will be the curse, in other words, the banishment from [God’s] Mercy, and theirs will be the ills of the [ultimate] abode, in the Hereafter, meaning, the most severe of its chastisements.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The day when their excuse) for disbelieving (availeth not the evil-doers) the disbelievers, (and theirs is the curse) wrath and torment, (and theirs the ill abode) the Fire.
